瑥字的基本解释

瑥
wēn
古人名用字。

瑥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wēn］
［《集韻》烏昆切，平，影。］
人名用字。晋代有翟瑥。见《晋书·乞伏国仁载记》。

瑥字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑥； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页739第03
【集韻】【韻會】?烏昆切，音溫。人名。【晉載記】乞伏乾使冠軍翟瑥伐禿吐渾。

瑥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
瑥字的起名意思

古人名用字。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wēn］
["Ji Yun" Wu Kun cut, flat , shadow. ]
Use characters for names. There was Zhai Zhen in the Jin Dynasty. See "Book of Jin · Begging for the Kingdom of Ren Zai Ji".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑥; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 739 03
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ukun Chi, sound temperature. Person's name. [Jin Zai Ji] Begging to make the champion, Zhai Yu, was bald and muddled.
